text: Sliema is a town on the northeast coast of Malta in the Northern Harbour District. It is a major residential and commercial area and a centre for shopping, dining and caf√© life. About 26,000 people lived there in 2013. ==Twin towns== * Les Sables-d'Olonne, France * Hartlepool, United Kingdom ==Other websites== * Sliema Local Council Category:Towns in Malta
title: Sliema
